newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: STC Singapore denies buying 250,000t palm oil.
newsitem.headline: STC Singapore denies buying 250,000t palm oil.

text.p: The branch manager of India's State Trading Corporation (STC) office in Singapore said on Friday STC was not in the market for up to 250,000 tonnes of palm oil for September/October shipment as rumoured in the market.
Singapore dealers said talk was circulating that Indian buyers were purchasing around 250,000 tonnes of palm oil for shipment over this period.
"We are not in the market for 250,000 tonnes of palm oil. We would never buy that quantity. We buy in lots of about 6,000 tonnes," the STC manager said.
Traders said that the talk was focusing on Indian buyers as a whole rather just STC.
